channel.title: Younes Belkada on Younes Belkada

item.title: About
item.description:
Younes Belkada is a former student at Polytech Sorbonne, Sorbonne Université where he was enrolled in the Applied Mathematics and Computer Science Master program. He did his exchange semester at École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne at the Data Science Master.

During his curriculum, Younes worked for Chainos Solution in VietNam, ISIR in Paris, Arbrea Labs and VITA Lab in Switzerland and currently working at Intel Corporation in Ireland.

Younes' interests focuses on Deep Learning applied to exciting real-world problems. His main interests are :

  • Computer Vision
  • Human pose estimation
  • Unsupervised Learning
  • Autonomous driving
